created_by: Ján Trenčanský, frack113, AlertIQ, Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Windows Defender Service Disabled
description: Detects when an attacker or tool disables the  Windows Defender service (WinDefend) via the registry
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\WinDefend\\Start AND winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000004\))`
